text: Herman Van Springel (14 August 1943 – 25 August 2022) was a Belgian road racing cyclist. He wore the Maillot Jaune during four stages of the 1968 Tour de France and for three stages in 1973. He won a record seven editions of the marathon Bordeaux–Paris. Van Springel died on 25 August 2022 in Grobbendonk, Belgium at the age of 79.Wielerwereld rouwt om "Monsieur Bordeaux-Paris" Herman Vanspringel ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Herman Van Springel
